title: Breaching Pikestaff
content:
Breaching Pikestaff Rare 4~16 Damage 1d10+2Piercing+ 1d4 Force Weapon Enchantment +2 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Concussive energy thumps like a mighty heartbeat from this pike. PikeTwo-Handed Extra Reach 8.1 190

Concussive energy thumps like a mighty heartbeat from this pike.

Breaching Pikestaff is one of the Pikes in Baldur's Gate 3. Breaching Pikestaff is a rare
